titleStmt.title: The Emperor's letter to James II, late king of England &c., dated the ninth of April, 1689 in answer to a letter he receiv'd from him, dated the 6th of February, 1688/9.
titleStmt.author: Leopold I, Holy Roman Emperor, 1640-1705.
